title: annie vs noc?
body: ok so tonight i was in a match, and i had a nocturne accuse me of scripting because i ulted tibbers on top of him when i was apparently feared, can anyone at all tell me if its possible to land an ult from annie while feared or what ?

replies.body:
When Unspeakable Horror causes your champ to flee (aka when you're feared) you can't cast any abilities. It is still possible to cast Tibbers the moment before you are feared and have it _appear_ as though it was cast during the fear though. 

Also, I had a look at the match and there's a chance they were just being salty. Gotta say though, randomly being called a scripter is one of the best compliments you can get in League ; )

> [{quoted}](name=Nijiiyo,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=9NEGhd80,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-25T04:33:52.350+0000)
>
> When Unspeakable Horror causes your champ to flee (aka when you're feared) you can't cast any abilities. It is still possible to cast Tibbers the moment before you are feared and have it _appear_ as though it was cast during the fear though. 
> 
> Also, I had a look at the match and there's a chance they were just being salty. Gotta say though, randomly being called a scripter is one of the best compliments you can get in League ; )

Why? Being called a scripter is essentially being told you're a disgusting cheater. The thing is that not all scripters are _good_. Some are godawful and others are just as bad. The thing is that most scripters are mechanically gifted, due to the scripts, but had godawful l decision making.

> [{quoted}](name=Third Reich,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=9NEGhd80,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-10-29T07:06:48.670+0000)
>
> Why? Being called a scripter is essentially being told you're a disgusting cheater. The thing is that not all scripters are _good_. Some are godawful and others are just as bad. The thing is that most scripters are **mechanically gifted**, due to the scripts, but had godawful l decision making.

When you aren't cheating and someone accuses you of cheating, the implication is you must have done something beyond expectation. To me, and many others, that feels good. Even if it was just dumb luck, the fact you made someone so mad they've accused you of cheating is very flattering in its own, unusual way. While I realise from the side it can appear more of an insult, the mainly negative connotations of the word "scripter" are rarely interpreted by the falsely accused player (who's probably havin' a chuckle).
